mapper.insert: insert into hz_hyper_calculation (id, `name`, cpu_num, cpu_frequency, memory, stroage_type, cluster_id, creator_id, create_time, is_change) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cpuNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cpuFrequency,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memory,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stroageType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clusterId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isChange,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.select: select id, `name`, cpu_num, cpu_frequency, memory, stroage_type, cluster_id, creator_id, create_time, is_change from hz_hyper_calculation where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
